name: Ripping the Sky
description:
Help bolt, this little hero will follow your path safely.

Go on, doing zig-zags to speed and take the electrical spheres to not run out of energy, while taking care not to touch the blocks with thorns and other threats along the way.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the arrow keys or touch screen to move to the sides.

Take the electric balls along the way to not lose power

Collect coins to unlock more characters
